query: INSERT INTO events (titlePt, titleEn, descriptionPt, descriptionEn, eventDate, locationPt, locationEn, imageUrl, published) VALUES ('Trabalhando com Skills, Hooks, Agents e Commands no Claude Code/Droid/Opencode', 'Working with Skills, Hooks, Agents and Commands in Claude Code/Droid/Opencode', 'Fred Amaral e Jefferson Rodrigues conduzirão um webinar técnico sobre como trabalhar com Skills, Hooks, Agents e Commands nas ferramentas Claude Code, Droid e Opencode.
